data.message: Ama Biggest Fan of Eminem n am From South Africa, Am Xhosa .. Eminem You so Dope I even say to my Fans you are a Black White Man cz no White Rapper raps like u except, like damn u incredible n matter of  Fact u Very inspirational n My Role Model Dawg, I look up to u .. You make me believe in myself .. n bcz of u I became a Rapper too wat u facing currently is kinda hurting me cz it shows the True colours Of ur so called Fans BT Marshall Mathers u always got that Fire in You🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥 .. You a Legend, A God, A Father n A Hero too✊✊ I Love You Eminem🙌🙌🙌🙌🙌🙌🙌  Am Supporting u 100% just cant wait 4 The New Album :)
